name: Friday Night Funkin Vs The Frustrated Gamer V2
name_original: Friday Night Funkin Vs The Frustrated Gamer V2
description:
BRANDON! if you're reading this i'll let you know that your videos inspire me to make baldi and fnf mods so in honor of it, i decided to make this mod for you. HOPE YOU ENJOY :D plus you should play the whole thing to understand the story

this is a fanmade tfg friday night funkin mod made by mimikyu949

this update features a new storyline to the full week, new songs for the full week and the roxy week, new icons, new charting, new characters and way more!

V1 of this mod: https://mimikyu949.itch.io/friday-night-funkin-vs-the-frustrated-game-full-mod

credits:

mimikyu949

sm principal

the frustrated gamer (of course)

cool features:

a gaming song (cover)

a vlog video

a new roxy song (and a cover)

new storyline

new icons

Version 3 will come someday
